original_text: They are also a picture of seven kings. Five of these kings have already stopped ruling. Another king is ruling now. The last king has not yet come. When he does come, he must rule only for a short time.
korean_text: 또 일곱 왕이라 다섯은 망하였고 하나는 있고 다른 하나는 아직 이르지 아니하였으나 이르면 반드시 잠시 동안 머무르리라

sentences.original_text: They are also a picture of seven kings.
Five of these kings have already stopped ruling.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 왕들 중 다섯은 이미 통치를 멈췄습니다.

sentences.original_text: The last king has not yet come.
he must rule only for a short time.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 단지 짧은 시간 동안만 통치해야 합니다.
